text: George Constantin (; 3 May 1933 – 30 April 1994) was a Romanian actor.DOCUMENTAR: George Constantin, ''Uriașul creator de personaje'' – AGERPRES. Agerpres.ro (26 April 2014). Retrieved on 2016-11-16. He appeared in more than fifty films from 1960 to 1994. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
